name: SickleCellDiseaseWithVasoOcclusiveEpisode
title: Sickle Cell Disease with Vaso Occlusive Episode
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Diagnoses of sickle cell disease (SCD) with vaso-occlusive episode (VOE)),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to diagnoses.),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnoses of SCD with VOE),(Exclusion Criteria: - Non crisis related SCD diagnoses; - SCD diagnoses with Cerebral Vascular Involvement)
